item.title: I love how the far more ethical food delivery company I signed up with only a year and a half ago has now been bought twice over by one of the single worst companies on the planet yay capitalism everything's great!
item.dc:creator: @FilmCritHULK

item.title:
RT by @FilmCritHULK: Yesterday, @glucastalkshow raised $42,313 for @AbortionFunds with @sethmeyers @paulscheer @robhuebel @scharpling @JulieCotnoir & Mantzoukas.
If we raised enough, Seth promised to put our GLTS nesting dolls on his desk.
WATCH: https://youtube.com/watch?v=fOUww9XeFzU
item.dc:creator: @patrickcotnoir
item.description:
Yesterday, @glucastalkshow raised $42,313 for @AbortionFunds with @sethmeyers @paulscheer @robhuebel @scharpling @JulieCotnoir & Mantzoukas.

If we raised enough, Seth promised to put our GLTS nesting dolls on his desk.

WATCH: invidious.fdn.fr/watch?v=fOUww9Xeâ€¦

item.title:
I watched POM POKO on a whim the other day and did not realize I was going to watch a gorgeous, wild, funny, haunting film about the horrors of environmentalism.
They also use their magic testicles as parachutes.
A million stars. No notes. https://www.patreon.com/posts/68436452
item.dc:creator: @FilmCritHULK
item.description:
I watched POM POKO on a whim the other day and did not realize I was going to watch a gorgeous, wild, funny, haunting film about the horrors of environmentalism.

They also use their magic testicles as parachutes.

A million stars. No notes.
patreon.com/posts/68436452

item.title:
I often don't really go for nostalgia trips, but I got the new Ninja Turtle's SHREDDER'S REVENGE game and-
Suddenly I Ratatouille'd right back to my haunted ass attic where I played The Hyper Stone Heist on Genesis with my friends until WAY too late.
item.dc:creator: @FilmCritHULK
item.description:
